\section{Introduction}
We present an updated list of direct strong evidence in favour of kicks being
imparted to newborn neutron stars. In particular we discuss the new
cases of evidence resulting from recent observations of the {X}-ray binary
Circinus~{X

title: Pulsar Astronomy --- 2000 and Beyond
